post.body: Apple Crisp, Salmon Loaf (really good!), Noodles and Veggies. He did very well for his first meal ever.
It was awesome. I told him he'll be doing this more often now that he's getting used to the kitchen a bit.
LOL.
It's fun to do and see others do it too. :)
Yep. @dailykindness
This is my main account.. and I host Dailykindness on here also. It's a kindness challenge with ideas.
MMm a brownie! Yum.
Thank you. We're doing ok. Jake was taking it hard the other day when he knew she was dying but today he seems more calm.
Nice! Have fun!
Thank you for your prayers.
Going to make lunch, do wash, clean daughters bedroom, clean our bedroom... and work on a project. Fun stuff.
Oh dear, daughter is 2 1/2 and she keeps on telling me.. "Mama, I want a car."
Someone want to come over and shovel for me? Just thought I'd ask. I really dislike winter.
Awake early to make sure teen gets on the bus. Heh.
Teenage son made dinner. it turned out very good. Even made apple crisp. Yum.
Feeling alittle unmotivated lately. Trying to get it back. Cleaning home today.
Thank you to my over 301 followers for reading a whole lotta nothing on my twitter. :) Hope you have a good day!
Made homemade waffles today. Wow, they were good. Never buying store waffles again!
Brrr. I'm freezing and I think it's time for bed.
Online while daughter and husband are sleeping. It's nice to have complete alone time. I hope they sleep good. Both need it.
